A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was terrible.  Just abysmally awful.  Not just as a Star Wars movie; but as a movie in general.  The story made no sense\, the movie couldn't pick what movie it wanted to be (is it a comedy? is it a drama? is it a space opera?  Will it jarringly bounce between these all at the same time?  The answer to that is yes.)

The movie itself is so logically inconsistent it hurts.   Stop trying to make all your movies Guardians of the Galaxy.  Just work with what you have! Or at least stop dragging another franchises name through the mud.

The only positive in this movie was that it was visually stunning.  Beautiful to look at.  But everything else was pure shit.
